description: This file defines a Settings class using pydantic's BaseSettings for application configuration management, including environment variables, defaults, and validation. It also provides a cached function to access the settings.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A pydantic BaseSettings subclass that encapsulates application configuration, loaded from environment variables and optionally from a .env file.

methods.name: _parse_list_env
methods.description: Static method to parse environment variables representing lists, supporting JSON arrays, CSV strings, and Python lists.
